short_summary: Purchase MRT 3900 Miranda Davit-CCGS Louis St Laurent
description: Definition of the requirement Canadian Coast St. John’s Newfoundland has a requirement to purchase a MRT 3900 Miranda Davit for the CCGS Louis St. Laurent
full_summary:
Purchase of MRT 3900 Miranda Davit for CCGS Louis St. Laurent
=====================================

### Solicitation Overview

* **Solicitation Number**: WS3968617123
* **Reference Number**: WS3968752157
* **Publication Date**: April 19, 2023
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 29, 2023, 2:00 PM (14:00)

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (Procurement Strategy and Delivery Branch) invites Canadian firms to submit a bid for the purchase of a MRT 3900 Miranda Davit for the CCGS Louis St. Laurent.

### Solicitation Details

* **Function**: The MRT 3900 Miranda Davit is a specialized marine equipment and the subject of this procurement.
* **Delivery**: The selected bidder will be responsible for furnishing, transporting, and installing the MRT 3900 Miranda Davit on board the CCGS Louis St. Laurent.
* **Location**: The CCGS Louis St. Laurent is homeported in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.
* **Delivery Region**: The procurement falls under the scope of the Newfoundland and Labrador (Pan) region.
* **Commercial Marine Crafts (UNSpsc)**: The requested procurement falls under the Universal Standard Product and Service Code (UNSpsc) 25111500.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to trade agreements tailored to the needs of the government of Canada. Relevant agreements include the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Contact and Other Details

For further details and clarification regarding the bid process, bidders are asked to contact: Dalton (Mr.), Contract Specialist, Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (Procurement Strategy and Delivery Branch). Dalton can be reached via email, at colleen.dalton@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, any other inquiry shall be released to the above.


### Online Access

Access additional documentation and information about the procurement through the following link: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16014841?extsite=MTYwMTQ4NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
